Sections.Text: Tyree Sanitorium, Dr. Elias Tyree, Director. December 11, 1918
The Great War unleashed unprecedented horror in Europe, and spawned uncountable nightmares in the minds of the soldiers who fought in its trenches.
Dr. Elias Tyree has converted his family estate into a sanitorium for shell-shocked soldiers, luring them in with promises of a peaceful recovery.
Lt. Sax won much praise from the War Department for his inventions and innovations, but testing them on the battlefield left his mind in a chaos.

Unfortunately, Dr. Tyree's sanitorium has proven to be a cure that's worse than the disease. The Doctor is experimenting on the patients, using some sort of serum to make their dreams worse, not better.
Using stolen equipment and his own ingenuity, Sax has fashioned a weapon and engineered his escape. He aims to free his fellow veterans and expose Tyree's crimes to the world.
Sax is determined to find the formula for the drug Tyree is injecting his patients with. Once he secures that, he can escape out the front door.
And anyone or anything that bars his way will get the same treatment Sax gave the Hun during the war.
